EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Scheme amends the Local Government (Superannuation) (Consolidation) 
Scheme 1998 to provide for changes in pension entitlements for fire brigade 
officers and fire brigade employees which limit the age at which fast accruals 
apply to 60.
